questions.name: Question1
questions.qtext: True or False: k-NN can be used for both classification and regression.
questions.explanation: In k-NN, we take the $k$ closest neighbors of a given point. If we are doing classification, we take the majority class of those k neighbors. For regression, we average the target feature for those $k$ neighbors.

questions.name: Question2
questions.qtext: True or False: Solving a non linear separation problem with a hard-margin kernelized SVM (Gaussian RBF Kernel) might lead to overfitting.
